comments: Fox (SAC) places his forearm against McConnell (IND) and marginal contact occurs as they come together at the end of the drive.
Mathurin (IND) initiates contact with Sabonis' (SAC) arm, which affects his play at the basket.
Murray (SAC) steps toward Sheppard's (IND) space and marginal contact occurs when he releases the pass.

Replay review of the out of bounds called on Kings (SAC) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Monk (SAC) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds. The Pacers retain the possession.
McConnell (IND) brings his left hand forward and brushes Fox's (SAC) arm after he gathers to move into his upward shooting motion.
Huerter (SAC) reaches across Hield's (IND) side and initiates illegal contact.
Monk (SAC) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Walker (IND) prior to incidental arm contact occurring.
Fox (SAC) briefly brings his right hand toward McConnell's (IND) side and marginal contact occurs at the start of his drive.
Hield (IND) legally contests Fox's (SAC) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
As Fox (SAC) moves around the screen by Sabonis (SAC), leg to leg contact occurs with his teammate that causes him to trip.  Any contact by McConnell (IND) during the play is marginal.
Sabonis (SAC) firms up over to his right leg in McConnell's (IND) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Turner (IND) commits a take foul on Monk (SAC) prior to his upward motion.
Monk (SAC) crosses the plane of the free throw line before the shot makes contact with the rim.
Huerter (SAC) initiates illegal contact across Smith's (IND) arm.
